div.p: This value set expansion contains 6 concepts.

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "HPV vaccines") = 3

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SHPVSingleDose for IMMZ.D18.S.Single-dose schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a human papillomavirus (HPV) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Alternative single-dose schedule
